title: [Large-Scale] Short-Intensive Course on Service Improvement and Organizational Development Based on Action Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic organizational management and service administration experience
context.additional_context: Practical learning utilizing VR simulations in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real service problem scenarios in VR environments to derive improvement plans
Learners can design team-based projects and establish execution plans by applying action learning methodologies
Learners can develop concrete implementation strategies and evaluation criteria for improving community services

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
